title: New stat?
body:
Stat: Inertia

The scientific definition is that Inertia is an object's resistance to change.

Inertia will lower the distance of knockbacks and the duration of knockups.

This stat will be separate from Tenacity

Sound ok? Maybe it'll be 10% inertia for an item and maybe it'll be in runes and masteries.

I just thought how it was kind of funny how tenacity affected all forms of cc except for knockups and knockbacks.

replies.body: I think it might be difficult to implement, but I like the idea.
